http.notFound: 404 Not Found (unknown ID or missing resource)
http.gone: 410 Gone (reserved for future use; not used in v1)
http.notAcceptable: 406 Not Acceptable (reserved for future RDF negotiation; v1 serves JSON-LD only)
http.rateLimit: 429 Too Many Requests (not used in v1 on GitHub Pages)
http.maintenance: 503 Service Unavailable (not used in v1 on GitHub Pages)
